name: Xcel VentX Long Sleeve Top - Women's
description: Made for performance paddlers, dragon boaters and athletes working it hard. It’s lightweight, quick-drying and breathable, and the relaxed t-shirt fit makes it comfortable to wear on the shore.Made of moisture-wicking polyester and spandex with 4-way stretch.Rated UPF30 and blocks 96% of UVA/UVB radiation from the sun.Thumbholes help keep the sleeves from riding up when wrestling with the surf.Raglan sleeves keep the shoulders from bunching up when paddling.
